docs.snippet: Five of the top 12 home run hitters in major league baseball history may never be enshrined in Cooperstown....
docs.lead_paragraph: Five of the top 12 home run hitters in major league baseball history may never be enshrined in Cooperstown.
docs.abstract: Alex Rodriguez joins group of baseball's biggest sluggers who are nonetheless pariahs due to their ties to performance-enhancing drugs; five of the top 12 home run hitters in major league baseball history may never be enshrined at the Hall of Fame due to doping.

headline.main: Heavy Hitters on Pariahs’ Row, Shunned by Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: On Pariahs’ Row, Shunned by Hall

docs.snippet: Anthony Bosch, who ran the Biogenesis anti-aging clinic, told “60 Minutes” that a fear of needles had led Alex Rodriguez to ask him to administer injections....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony Bosch, who ran the Biogenesis anti-aging clinic, told “60 Minutes” that a fear of needles had led Alex Rodriguez to ask him to administer injections.
docs.abstract: Anthony Bosch, who ran Biogenesis anti-aging clinic in Florida, admits during interview with CBS program 60 Minutes to injecting Alex Rodriguez with performance enhancing drugs; admission comes a day after Rodriguez received 2014 season-long doping suspension.

headline.main: Clinic Director Says He Injected Rodriguez
headline.print_headline: Clinic Director Says He Injected Rodriguez

docs.snippet: An arbitrator upheld most of Alex Rodriguez’s doping suspension, but the evidence behind the decision has not been revealed, leaving the public short on details....
docs.lead_paragraph: An arbitrator upheld most of Alex Rodriguez’s doping suspension, but the evidence behind the decision has not been revealed, leaving the public short on details.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of the Times column argues that arbitrator's decision to uphold most of Alex Rodriguez's doping suspension without revealing evidence behind the decision leaves the public in the dark.

headline.main: In Alex Rodriguez Decision, the Devil Is in a Lack of Detail
headline.print_headline: In Decision, the Devil Is in a Lack of Detail

docs.snippet: Embattled New York Yankees slugger Alex Rodriguez asked a federal judge on Monday to throw out an arbitrator's decision suspending him for the 2014 baseball season for doping, escalating a battle with Major League Baseball that shows no signs of a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Embattled New York Yankees slugger Alex Rodriguez asked a federal judge on Monday to throw out an arbitrator's decision suspending him for the 2014 baseball season for doping, escalating a battle with Major League Baseball that shows no signs of abating.

headline.main: NY Yankee Rodriguez Asks Judge to Throw Out MLB Suspension
